name: codechalet
description: This static website is built using Bootstrap and Jekyll.

scripts.css:compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/_main.scss css/style.css
scripts.css: npm run css:compile && npm run css:minify
scripts.js:copy: npm run js:bootstrap && npm run js:popper && npm run js:holder
scripts.build: npm run js:copy && bundle exec jekyll serve -P 5000
